idea-plugin.name: Sitects One Dark
idea-plugin.description:
Sitects One Dark is a sleek and modern theme for JetBrains IDEs, inspired by the popular Atom One Dark color scheme.

It offers a refined, consistent and developer-friendly experience with carefully adjusted syntax highlighting, background contrast, and UI accents that reduce eye strain during long coding sessions.

  • Fully supports both light and dark mode switching.
  • Tested with the latest IntelliJ-based IDEs.
  • Minimalistic and distraction-free appearance, optimized for focus.

Created and maintained by Sitects, tailored for developers who appreciate clean aesthetics and great usability.
idea-plugin.change-notes:
• 🎉 Initial release of the Sitects One Dark theme.
  • 🎨 Inspired by Atom's One Dark color palette with custom enhancements.
  • 🧪 Tested on IntelliJ IDEA, PhpStorm, WebStorm, and PyCharm.
  • 🛠️ Includes support for status bars, popup menus, syntax highlighting, and more.
  • ⚙️ Removed <until-build> to support newer IDE versions without needing plugin updates.
